name: Magic Coins
overview: Magic Coins is a puzzle board game for up to two human or computer players. The aim requires taking over as many opponents coins as possible. Coins may be moved in two ways, by multiplication (jump on the adjacent field) or simple changing position (jump two squares from the current spot). Placing the coin next to opponent's coins causes acquisition. The game continues until the inability to make a move or acquiring of all coins on the board. The game features the level editor, allowing the change the number of start up coins (2 to 6) and background type.
